archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.2.8b: b) identifying the type and nature of the threats that may target the organisation (i.e. who could target the organisation, and the amount of time and resources they are willing to invest in an attack)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
